column4: Doesn't Ctrl Alt + and Ctrl Alt - change screen resolution on Gnome using X.org ?
only within already detected ability - there may be more if you wiki.ubuntu.com/resolution
Ok that sounds interesting. Will have a look
I have everything working excellently well, and I can change the resolution through gnome-display-properties. I just want it to work using Ctrl Alt + and Ctrl Alt - too.
if it is not working check out your fonts and make sure gnome fonts match xserver-xorg
so in breezy for FlashPlayer should I install flashplugin-nonfree or should I install mozilla-flashplayer ?
I know little of flash, in your shoes I would do the mozilla-flashplayer
exactly my thoughts. Just got a bit worried that someone changed the RestrictedFormats page.
there have been "improvements" to the process advised by a senior developer
and I trust the guy who editied it
Yes, and I always trust wikis. :)
